metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1161 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: ISO 15765 and ISO 10681 dissector crash in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.3 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.11 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
